results.purpose: Tracks open and planned hiring roles for EPD (Engineering, Product, Design) New Ventures division for 2026, including backfills and new positions
key_data_points: Multiple roles in Toronto (CA) and Berlin (DE) locations
Career steps range from CS4 (Mid Level) to CS7 (Associate Director)
Cost center code: 8191 for most roles

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: Squad with 2 open engineering roles (CS4 FE, CS6 Staff FE) in Toronto, experiencing hiring challenges

entities.name: The Pets Table (TPT)
entities.context: New product requiring 3 roles (1 filled Staff PM, 2 pending App/RN engineers for Q2 2026), app launch planned Q3 2026

entities.name: Good Chop
entities.context: Squad needing 3 roles (1 filled FE transfer, 2 pending: Senior PM and Senior Designer) due to team expansion to 10 people

entities.name: Market Innovation & Optimization (MIO)
entities.context: Squad with 2 backend roles (1 live CS4, 1 filled CS5)

entities.name: Tamir Arnesty
entities.context: Left Factor Form squad in Oct, CS4 FE backfill role open

entities.name: Brian Leach
entities.context: Left Factor Form in Aug due to US RTO policy, CS6 Staff FE backfill struggling to find candidate

entities.name: Prateek Jajoo
entities.context: Filled Staff PM role for TPT, starts December

entities.name: Chiamaka Glory Nwolisa
entities.context: Internal transfer from Growth Alliance filling Good Chop FE role, starts Dec

entities.name: Laurent Guillemain
entities.context: CEO of TPT brand, aligned on 2 pending App/RN roles

entities.name: Dominic
entities.context: Verbally approved TPT roles

entities.name: Beatrice Dimarucut
entities.context: Good Chop PO needing support as team expands

insights: Hiring challenges evident: Factor Form has had 2 candidates reject offers at final stage, and struggling to find Staff Engineer with web/Shopify/RN experience
Strategic location consolidation: Factor Form squad entirely in Canada (Toronto), while most other roles are in Berlin
Flexible role repurposing: Multiple instances of using backfill positions/PIDs for different roles than originally planned
US RTO policy impact: At least one departure (Brian Leach) attributed to return-to-office policy
Team growth driving hiring: Good Chop expanding to 10 people, TPT scaling for app launch
Internal mobility preferred: 2 roles filled via internal transfers rather than external hiring
Timeline dependencies: TPT App/RN roles pending until Q2 2026 based on app launch visibility
Contractor strategy abandoned: MIO squad tried contractor route for 2 months before switching to permanent hire
Career progression planning: Chiamaka expected to be promoted to SE within 12 months

results.purpose: Tracks open and planned hiring roles for EPD (Engineering, Product, Design) New Ventures division for 2026, including backfills and new positions across different squads
key_data_points: Career steps range from CS4 (Mid Level) to CS7 (Associate Director)

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: Squad with 2 open engineering roles (CS4 and CS6) in Toronto, facing recruitment challenges

entities.name: The Pets Table (TPT)
entities.context: New product with 1 filled Staff PM role and 2 pending app/RN engineering roles planned for Q2 2026

entities.name: Good Chop
entities.context: Squad expanding to 10 people, needs Product Owner and Designer backfills

entities.name: Market Innovation & Optimization (MIO)
entities.context: Squad with 1 live backend role and 1 filled backend role

entities.name: Tamir Arnesty
entities.context: Left Factor Form squad in Oct, CS4 FE developer backfill in progress

entities.name: Brian Leach
entities.context: Left Factor Form in Aug due to US RTO policy, CS6 Staff Engineer backfill struggling to find candidate

entities.name: Prateek Jajoo
entities.context: Filled Staff PM role for TPT, starts December

entities.name: Chiamaka Glory Nwolisa
entities.context: Internal transfer from Growth Alliance to Good Chop, starts December

entities.name: Laurent Guillemain
entities.context: CEO of TPT brand, aligned on new app/RN roles

entities.name: Dominic
entities.context: Verbally approved TPT roles

entities.name: Beatrice Dimarucut
entities.context: Good Chop PO needing support as team expands

insights: Recruitment challenges: Factor Form squad has had 2 candidates reject offers at final stage, and struggling to find CS6 Staff Engineer with cross-platform experience (web, Shopify, RN)
Geographic concentration: Factor Form squad entirely based in Canada (Toronto), while most other roles are in Berlin
US RTO policy impact: At least one departure (Brian Leach) attributed to US return-to-office policy
Internal mobility: 2 roles being filled through internal transfers rather than external hiring
Budget optimization: Repurposing backfill positions and PIDs (e.g., intern position repurposed for TPT Staff PM, CS7 role downgraded to CS5)
Timing strategy: TPT app roles intentionally delayed until Q2 2026 pending better visibility on app launch timelines (Q3 2026 target)
Team expansion: Good Chop squad growing to 10 people, requiring additional PO and design support
Contractor strategy failed: MIO squad attempted to use contractor from Gri Dynamics for 2 months before pivoting to permanent hire
High priority roles: Importance ratings of 3-5 (out of 5) indicate all tracked roles are medium to critical priority

results.purpose: Tracks open and planned hiring roles for EPD (Engineering, Product, Design) New Ventures division for 2026, including backfills and new positions across various product squads
key_data_points: 3 roles already filled (Prateek Jajoo, Chiamaka Glory Nwolisa, Vini)
Career steps range from CS4 (Mid Level) to CS7 (Associate Director)
Cost Center Code: 8191 for all roles

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: Squad with 2 open engineering roles (CS4 FE, CS6 Staff FE) in Toronto, experiencing offer rejections

entities.name: The Pets Table (TPT)
entities.context: New product requiring 3 roles: 1 filled Staff PM (CS7), 2 pending App/RN engineers (CS4, CS5) planned for Q2 2025 opening

entities.name: Good Chop
entities.context: Squad expanding to 10 people, needs 3 roles: 1 filled FE transfer, 1 pending PO, 1 pending designer to replace Marina Guthmann

entities.name: Market Innovation & Optimization (MIO)
entities.context: Squad with 2 backend roles: 1 live CS4 BE (delayed due to failed contractor search), 1 filled CS5 BE

entities.name: Tamir Arnesty
entities.context: Left Factor Form squad in Oct, CS4 FE backfill in progress

entities.name: Brian Leach
entities.context: Left Factor Form in Aug due to US RTO policy, CS6 Staff FE backfill struggling to find candidate with web/Shopify/RN experience

entities.name: Prateek Jajoo
entities.context: Filled Staff PM role for TPT, starts December

entities.name: Chiamaka Glory Nwolisa
entities.context: Internal transfer from Growth Alliance to Good Chop, starts Dec, expected SE promotion within 12 months

entities.name: Laurent Guillemain
entities.context: CEO of TPT brand, aligned on 2 pending App/RN roles

entities.name: Dominic
entities.context: Verbally approved TPT roles

entities.name: Marina Guthmann
entities.context: Exiting company, CS6 Senior Product Designer backfill needed for Good Chop

insights: Recruitment challenges: Factor Form squad has had 2 candidates reject offers at final stage, and struggling to find Staff Engineer with specific tech stack (web, Shopify, React Native)
Geographic concentration: Factor Form squad entirely based in Canada (Toronto), while most other roles are in Berlin
Strategic workforce planning: Using backfill position IDs creatively to fund net new roles (e.g., intern PID repurposed for TPT Staff PM)
Internal mobility: At least 2 roles being filled through internal transfers rather than external hiring
US RTO policy impact: At least one departure (Brian Leach) attributed to return-to-office policy
Timing dependencies: TPT app roles (2 pending) contingent on Q3 2026 app launch timeline, planned to open Q2 2025
Team scaling: Good Chop expanding to 10 people with product-intensive content and lifestyle strategy requiring additional PO support
Contractor strategy failure: MIO squad attempted 2-month contractor search through Gri Dynamics before pivoting to permanent hire
Career progression planning: Chiamaka identified for promotion to SE within 12 months of starting
